channel.title: MLB on Ethan Peterson's Site
channel.description: Recent content in MLB on Ethan Peterson's Site

item.title: A deeper look at MLB trends
item.description: Baseball is full of crazy trends. Some are incredibly impressive, like the New York Yankees winning five World Series championships (including four in a row) in the 1930s and six in the 1950s. Some are incredibly abysmal, like the Chicago Cubs’ 108-year drought without a World Series championship from 1908 to 2016. In this blog, I’m going to be taking a look at four different trends in Major League Baseball and creating data visualizations for us to view using R-Studio.
